name: Improved Robot Movement
description:
Controls

 Arrow Keys, Z(Climb), X(Dash), C(Jump)

Description

A modified movement system prototype using the base code of Celeste's Movement | Mix and Jam (link).  You can select the three different styles and switch levels using the bottom buttons.

Made for UCSC's CMPM/AGPM 170 class, by a team of 8 in a week's time.

Credits

Elizabeth Arnold - Color Change on Dash

Noah Hart - Reset Dash on Wall, Stationary Dash, UI, Level Design

Zachary Hollaway - SFXs

Nile Imtiaz - Manual Fastfalling, Stretchy Jump Animation

Liam Kaldes - Ground Collision Visuals, UI

Tai Wen Lee - Coyote Time, Jump Cache, Edge Climb, Ground Collision Changes, UI

Qinglan Li - Consistent Wall Jumping

Ching Kei Yiu - BGM
